product_name: NOCO XGrid 11W USB Battery Pack + LED Flashlight
long_description: This compact unit packs backcountry power and illumination into a single device, energizing your favorite portable electronics at the campsite or casting 250-lumen light on an emergency situation.
short_description: This compact unit packs backcountry power and illumination into a single device, energizing your favorite portable electronics at the campsite or casting 250-lumen light on an emergency situation.
